description: Information about service changes required for upgrade works and major events. Includes driving, walking and cycling as well as public transport

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["In a city as complex as London there are often vital planned works or special events which could have an impact on transport. Here we list the major works and events that could affect your journey, and provide advice to help you plan."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
The calendar below gives travel advice for some of London's biggest major works and events. This is updated regularly with the latest information.
To see all changes that may affect your journey:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["\u003cstrong\u003eTube, Overground, Trams and TfL Rail:\u003c/strong\u003e Check \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/planned-track-closures\"\u003eplanned closures and service changes\u003c/a\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eNational Rail:\u003c/strong\u003e Check \u003ca href=\"http://www.nationalrail.co.uk/service_disruptions/indicator.aspx\"\u003eNational Rail works\u003c/a\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eRoad users:\u003c/strong\u003e Check our \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/traffic/status/\"\u003etraffic status tool\u003c/a\u003e and choose the date of travel, or view our \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/travel-advice-for-road-users\"\u003etravel advice for road users\u003c/a\u003e page for a two-month overview","\u003cstrong\u003eBuses:\u003c/strong\u003e Check temporary bus service changes and \u003ca href=\"/modes/buses/bus-changes\"\u003epermanent bus service changes\u003c/a\u003e "]}
You can also sign up to receive direct message Twitter alerts about severe delays.
If your journey is affected by works or events, leave extra time to travel and if you can, travel out of peak hours: 07:00-10:00 and 16:00-19:00.

{"template":"table","rows":[["\u003cstrong\u003eWork or event\u003c/strong\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eTransport modes affected\u003c/strong\u003e ","\u003cstrong\u003eArea\u003c/strong\u003e "],[" \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/london-bridge-works\"\u003eLondon Bridge works\u003c/a\u003e ","Driving, buses, cycling, walking","London Bridge area"],[" \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/cycleway-4\"\u003eCycleway 4 construction\u003c/a\u003e ","Driving, buses, cycling","A200 Tooey Street and Jamaica Road area"],[" \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/cycleway-9\"\u003eCycleway 9 construction\u003c/a\u003e ","Driving, buses, cycling","West London (Kew Bridge and Chiswick area)"],[" \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/euston-road-works\"\u003eEuston Road works\u003c/a\u003e ","Driving, buses, cycling","Euston Road area"],[" \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/west-end-project\"\u003eWest End Project\u003c/a\u003e ","Roads, buses, cycling","Tottenham Court Road area"],[],[" \u003ca href=\"/status-updates/major-works-and-events/hammersmith-bridge-closure\"\u003eHammersmith Bridge closure\u003c/a\u003e ","Roads, buses","Hammersmith Bridge area"]]}
